main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted in El Centro, California on 6 April 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed by a USAF Tactical Institute Center operator from El Centro Air Force Base., The object approached from the north at approximately 5 miles away and hovered at a distance of about 2000 yards., The object then accelerated to a high speed and disappeared heading south., The sighting lasted for approximately fifteen to twenty minutes in clear weather with no sound., An estimated diameter of the object was between 18 to 20 feet.
sighted object: an elongated dark object in the sky
